Articles.Content:
Hellow fellows kerbonauts! Been hanging in this forum for a few days now, and so far nothing but cool people, interesting (and sometimes veeeery technical) discussions, talented modders... This place is great! As is KSP... I would have sold everything as a kid for a game like this. My very first one was I-War (what a start heh?) so newtonian physics was not new to me, but of all the space simulators, KSP is the most fun, the most educative and creative of all.

About me, well... I'm french, i'm a guy, I do have some sound editing skills (if that can be useful to some) and I'm addicted to chocolate. Hope I can be a usefull part of this community!
Bonjour en retour! Hello, and bienvenue to ze forum, frenchster as I am!

mmm chocolate... Bienvenue cousin

Sois ÃƒÂ  l'aise de poser les questions que tu as. This community is awesome.
